start.text: You awaken in the Rogue Encampment, a refuge for adventurers. Akara greets you with a task.

stay_encampment.text: You decide to rest at the encampment, but danger looms outside...

blood_moor.text: You step into the Blood Moor, a land overrun by Fallen demons.

cold_plains.text: You arrive at the Cold Plains. An eerie silence fills the air.

stony_field.text: The Stony Field lies ahead, and you notice a strange circle of stones...

dark_passage.text: You enter a dark passage, where torches flicker ominously.

black_marsh.text: The Black Marsh is treacherous, filled with lurking horrors.

forgotten_tower.text: A ruined tower stands before you, haunted by the Countess!

tamoe_highland.text: The Tamoe Highland is rugged, leading to the Monastery Gates.

monastery_gate.text: You stand at the gates of the Rogue Monastery. Evil resides within.

catacombs.text: The depths of the Monastery reek of death. You sense a great evil ahead.

ending.text: With Andariel vanquished, peace returns to the land. Your journey continues...
